_header: The land of the moon shall lose her light
_description: Prophecy attributed to Merlin, added at end of one copy of The Siege of Thebes (6276-13) — one cross-rhymed quatrain

CamTCC1283.Transcription:
The land of the mone shall lose hir lighteif she surmounthe the
                    degree of the sonneAnd for hir presumption shee shall of rightebe
                    darkened quite and ouercome
